downloadTitle: Microsoft Speech Platform - Server Software Development Kit (SDK)
downloadDescription: Software Development Kit (SDK) for the Microsoft Speech Platform - Server Runtime.
detailsSection:
Update: Microsoft Speech Platform has been updated. See Microsoft Speech Platform - Software Development Kit (SDK) 11 for more information.

Software Development Kit (SDK) for the Microsoft Speech Platform - Server Runtime. This software development kit contains the documentation, development resources, tools and samples for development of speech applications that utilize the Microsoft Speech Platform - Server Runtime.
systemRequirementsSection:
Development is supported on:
  • Windows Vista or later
  • Windows 2003 Server or later
  • Windows 2008 Server or later
Deployment is supported on:
  • Windows 2003 Server or later
  • Windows 2008 Server or later
installInstructionSection:
• Click the file you want to download from the list below.
  • Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
Important File Download Details
  • The documentation is currently available as a separate download from the Software Development Kit see the release notes for more information
  • Please review the release notes for additional information

relatedResourcesSection.title: microsoft Speech Platform - Server Runtime Languages
